qas.question: How many people signed a petition to boycott Sony Music in 2016?
Over a million people signed a petition in how many hours?
In February 2006, how many people signed a petition calling for a boycott of Sony Music?
Rape allegations were made against music producer Kesha against artist?

plausible_answers.text: free her from her contract with Sony Music

qas.question: Kesha asked a California Supreme Court to do what?

context: In February 2016, <a0_0><b2_0>over a hundred thousand<b2_0/><a0_0/> people signed a petition in just <b1_0>twenty-four<b1_0/> hours, calling for a boycott of Sony Music and all other Sony-affiliated businesses after rape allegations against music producer <b3_0>Dr. Luke<b3_0/> were made by musical artist Kesha. Kesha asked a New York City Supreme Court to <b4_0>free her from her contract with Sony Music<b4_0/> but the court denied the request, prompting widespread public and media response.
